title: There's room for yi buffs in the assassin rework
body:
So it's been a while since Yi was nerfed multiple times to pigeonhole him into building devourer + rageblade. Devourer has been removed and rageblade has been reworked into a mediocre item he can't make use of anymore.

I think he's due for some buffs. For those that are worried he'll start terrorizing low elo again, his performance appears to be mediocre in bronze/silver right (45-46% respectively) over the past month so I think we have plenty of room for buffs without breaking him in lower brackets.
http://na.op.gg/statistics/champion/

replies.body:
yi is not an assassin
https://champion.gg/champion/MasterYi
he's a little on the low side but eh. more champions deserve buffs than him

There is room for a total yi kit overhaul.

His kit and playstyle are too binary to ever be truly balanced.
